News.headline: Here at the Daggers: A Night at the Races
News.page_title: Here at the Daggers: A Night at the Races
News.URL_keywords: Here at the Daggers: A Night at the Races
News.short_description: All proceeds from the night will be in aid of The Davies Family Quest for Klinefelters Awareness
News.description:
On the 12th November at the Daggers there will be a charity horse racing night.

Racing starts at 8pm, entry is pay on the door at £3 per person.

All proceeds made from the night will go directly to aid the Davies Family quest for Klinefelters Awareness.

Come down to the Daggers to enjoy a great night of horse racing while raising money for a great cause.
